node.title: Phoenix skipper Ruger counts cost of COVID-plagued A-League campaign
node.description: The midfielder was subbed off at halftime of their last 4-0 loss to Adelaide.
node.content: ["Wellington Phoenix skipper Alex Rufer has revealed the pain of leading his team through one of the most turbulent periods in the club's history.", "The captain admits he's underperformed this season and hopes to wipe the slate clean on Friday, when the \u2018Nix return to A-League action, after nearly three weeks sidelined by COVID-19", "He may wear it on his sleeve, but the captain\u2019s armband weighs heavily on Rufer\u2019s shoulders.", "\u201cFor me personally, it\u2019s been a little bit up and down,\u201d he says.\u00a0", "The 25-year old was chosen to lead the side this season, after nearly a decade at the club, but the responsibility has taken some adjusting to.", "\u201cI'm trying to be the best version of myself, which has been frustrating, because in a couple games, I haven't been the best version of me.\u201d\u00a0", "At times, the defensive midfielder has paid the price. Rufer was subbed off at half-time of their last outing, when they fell to a 4-0 defeat against Adelaide.", "\u201cIt's not from a lack of trying,\u201d he laments. \u201cI try my best every day, I try my best to be a leader and to be me.\u201d", "Phoenix coach Ufuk Talay has seen the toll leadership has taken on his captain.", "\u201cI put a lot of weight on his shoulders by giving him the armband this season, so there's a lot of expectation,\u201d says Talay. \u201cI have a lot of expectation of him, so for me, it's up to him to step up and I think he has the attributes to do that.\u201d", "Rufer was one of 19 players struck down with COVID-19 and the time on the sidelines has given him a fresh perspective.", "\u201cIt's a challenge that I\u2019m up for, so it's going to be a good year,\u201d he says. \u201cI\u2019m confident we can turn this season around.\u201d", "The Phoenix hope to notch up just their second win of the campaign against Western United on Friday."]
